name: Cyber Strike (svetskijkonstantin)
description:
The game being developed. All year I plan to develop a game and, ultimately, I want to put together a full-fledged project that can be fully played. I have a lot of ideas that I will try to implement. You can help me!

Many mechanics in the game are not implemented.  But I want to share it with you in the hope of feedback. If it's not difficult for you, share your impressions: what did you dislike, what should be improved, what should be removed? I will be very glad!
